02434                {
02435                   // wrong orientation -- swap vertices 0 and 1 so that
02436                   //  we don't change the marked edge:  (0,1,2) -> (1,0,2)
02437                   j = bv[0]; bv[0] = bv[1]; bv[1] = j;
02438                   wo++;
02439                }
02440             }
02441             break;
02442 
02443             case Element::HEXAHEDRON:
02444                switch (faces_info[be_to_face[i]].Elem1Inf/64)
02445                {
02446                case 0:
02447                   v[0] = ev[3]; v[1] = ev[2]; v[2] = ev[1]; v[3] = ev[0];
02448                   break;
02449                case 1:
02450                   v[0] = ev[0]; v[1] = ev[1]; v[2] = ev[5]; v[3] = ev[4];
02451                   break;
02452                case 2:
02453                   v[0] = ev[1]; v[1] = ev[2]; v[2] = ev[6]; v[3] = ev[5];
02454                   break;
02455                case 3:
02456                   v[0] = ev[2]; v[1] = ev[3]; v[2] = ev[7]; v[3] = ev[6];
02457                   break;
02458                case 4:
02459                   v[0] = ev[3]; v[1] = ev[0]; v[2] = ev[4]; v[3] = ev[7];
02460                   break;
02461                case 5:
02462                   v[0] = ev[4]; v[1] = ev[5]; v[2] = ev[6]; v[3] = ev[7];
02463                   break;
02464                }
02465                if (GetQuadOrientation(v, bv) % 2)
02466                {
02467                   j = bv[0]; bv[0] = bv[2]; bv[2] = j;
02468                   wo++;
02469                }
02470                break;
02471             }
02472          }
02473       }
02474    }
02475 //#ifdef MFEM_DEBUG
02476    if (wo > 0)
02477       cout << "Orientation fixed in " << wo << " of "<< NumOfBdrElements
02478            << " boundary elements" << endl;
02479 //#endif
02480 }
02481 
02482 void Mesh::GetElementEdges(int i, Array<int> &edges, Array<int> &cor)
02483    const
02484 {
02485    if (el_to_edge)
02486       el_to_edge->GetRow(i, edges);
02487    else
02488       mfem_error("Mesh::GetElementEdges(...) element to edge table "
02489                  "is not generated.");
02490 
02491    const int *v = elements[i]->GetVertices();
02492    const int ne = elements[i]->GetNEdges();
02493    cor.SetSize(ne);
02494    for (int j = 0; j < ne; j++)
02495    {
02496       const int *e = elements[i]->GetEdgeVertices(j);
02497       cor[j] = (v[e[0]] < v[e[1]]) ? (1) : (-1);
02498    }
02499 }
02500 
02501 void Mesh::GetBdrElementEdges(int i, Array<int> &edges, Array<int> &cor)
02502    const
02503 {
02504    if (Dim == 2)
02505    {
02506       edges.SetSize(1);
02507       cor.SetSize(1);
02508       edges[0] = be_to_edge[i];
02509       const int *v = boundary[i]->GetVertices();
02510       cor[0] = (v[0]<v[1]) ? (1) : (-1);
02511    }
02512    else if (Dim == 3)
02513    {
02514       if (bel_to_edge)
02515          bel_to_edge->GetRow(i, edges);
02516       else
02517          mfem_error("Mesh::GetBdrElementEdges(...)");
02518 
02519       const int *v = boundary[i]->GetVertices();
02520       const int ne = boundary[i]->GetNEdges();
02521       cor.SetSize(ne);
02522       for (int j = 0; j < ne; j++)
02523       {
02524          const int *e = boundary[i]->GetEdgeVertices(j);
02525          cor[j] = (v[e[0]] < v[e[1]]) ? (1) : (-1);
02526       }
02527    }
02528 }
02529 
02530 void Mesh::GetFaceEdges(int i, Array<int> &edges, Array<int> &o) const
02531 {
02532    if (Dim != 3)
02533       return;
02534 
02535    GetFaceEdgeTable(); // generate face_edge Table (if not generated)
02536 
02537    face_edge->GetRow(i, edges);
02538 
02539    // to do: set the orientation 'o'
02540 }
02541 
02542 void Mesh::GetEdgeVertices(int i, Array<int> &vert) const
02543 {
02544    if (Dim == 2 && faces.Size() == NumOfEdges)
02545    {
02546       faces[i]->GetVertices(vert);
02547    }
02548    else
02549    {
02550       GetEdgeVertexTable(); // generate edge_vertex Table (if not generated)
02551 
02552       edge_vertex->GetRow(i, vert);
02553    }
02554 }
02555 
02556 Table *Mesh::GetFaceEdgeTable() const
02557 {
02558    if (face_edge)
02559       return face_edge;
02560 
02561    if (Dim != 3)
02562       return NULL;
02563 
02564    DSTable v_to_v(NumOfVertices);
02565    GetVertexToVertexTable(v_to_v);
02566 
02567    face_edge = new Table;
02568    GetElementArrayEdgeTable(faces, v_to_v, *face_edge);
02569 
02570    return(face_edge);
02571 }
02572 
02573 Table *Mesh::GetEdgeVertexTable() const
02574 {
02575    if (edge_vertex)
02576       return edge_vertex;
02577 
02578    DSTable v_to_v(NumOfVertices);
02579    GetVertexToVertexTable(v_to_v);
02580 
02581    int nedges = v_to_v.NumberOfEntries();
02582    edge_vertex = new Table(nedges, 2);
02583    for (int i = 0; i < NumOfVertices; i++)
02584    {
02585       for (DSTable::RowIterator it(v_to_v, i); !it; ++it)
02586       {
02587          int j = it.Index();
02588          edge_vertex->Push(j, i);
02589          edge_vertex->Push(j, it.Column());
02590       }
02591    }
02592    edge_vertex->Finalize();
02593 
02594    return edge_vertex;
02595 }
02596 
02597 Table *Mesh::GetVertexToElementTable()
02598 {
02599    int i, j, nv, *v;
02600 
02601    Table *vert_elem = new Table;
02602 
02603    vert_elem->MakeI(NumOfVertices);
02604 
02605    for (i = 0; i < NumOfElements; i++)
02606    {
02607       nv = elements[i]->GetNVertices();
02608       v  = elements[i]->GetVertices();
02609       for (j = 0; j < nv; j++)
02610          vert_elem->AddAColumnInRow(v[j]);
02611    }
02612 
02613    vert_elem->MakeJ();
02614 
02615    for (i = 0; i < NumOfElements; i++)
02616    {
02617       nv = elements[i]->GetNVertices();
02618       v  = elements[i]->GetVertices();
02619       for (j = 0; j < nv; j++)
02620          vert_elem->AddConnection(v[j], i);
02621    }
02622 
02623    vert_elem->ShiftUpI();
02624 
02625    return vert_elem;
02626 }
02627 
02628 void Mesh::GetElementFaces(int i, Array<int> &fcs, Array<int> &cor)
02629    const
02630 {
02631    int n, j;
02632 
02633    if (el_to_face)
02634       el_to_face->GetRow(i, fcs);
02635    else
02636       mfem_error("Mesh::GetElementFaces(...) : el_to_face not generated.");
02637 
02638    n = fcs.Size();
02639    cor.SetSize(n);
02640    for (j = 0; j < n; j++)
02641       if (faces_info[fcs[j]].Elem1No == i)
02642          cor[j] = faces_info[fcs[j]].Elem1Inf % 64;
02643 #ifdef MFEM_DEBUG
02644       else if (faces_info[fcs[j]].Elem2No == i)
02645          cor[j] = faces_info[fcs[j]].Elem2Inf % 64;
02646       else
02647          mfem_error("Mesh::GetElementFaces(...) : 2");
02648 #else
02649    else
02650       cor[j] = faces_info[fcs[j]].Elem2Inf % 64;
02651 #endif
02652 }
02653 
02654 void Mesh::GetBdrElementFace(int i, int *f, int *o) const
02655 {
02656    const int *bv, *fv;
02657 
02658    if (State == Mesh::TWO_LEVEL_COARSE)
02659    {
02660       // the coarse level 'be_to_face' and 'faces' are destroyed
02661       mfem_error("Mesh::GetBdrElementFace (...)");
02662    }
02663 
02664    *f = be_to_face[i];
02665    bv = boundary[i]->GetVertices();
02666    fv = faces[be_to_face[i]]->GetVertices();
02667 
02668    // find the orientation of the bdr. elem. w.r.t.
02669    // the corresponding face element (that's the base)
02670    switch (GetBdrElementType(i))
02671    {
02672    case Element::TRIANGLE:
02673       *o = GetTriOrientation(fv, bv);
02674       break;
02675    case Element::QUADRILATERAL:
02676       *o = GetQuadOrientation(fv, bv);
02677       break;
02678    default:
02679       mfem_error("Mesh::GetBdrElementFace(...) 2");
02680    }
02681 }
02682 
02683 int Mesh::GetFaceBaseGeometry(int i) const
02684 {
02685    // Here, we assume all faces are of the same type
02686    switch (GetElementType(0))
02687    {
02688    case Element::TRIANGLE:
02689    case Element::QUADRILATERAL:
02690       return Geometry::SEGMENT; // in 2D 'face' is an edge
02691 
02692    case Element::TETRAHEDRON:
02693       return Geometry::TRIANGLE;
02694    case Element::HEXAHEDRON:
02695       return Geometry::SQUARE;
02696    default:
02697       mfem_error("Mesh::GetFaceBaseGeometry(...) #1");
02698    }
02699    return(-1);
02700 #if 0
02701    if (faces[i] == NULL)
02702       switch (GetElementType(faces_info[i].Elem1No))
02703       {
02704       case Element::TETRAHEDRON:
02705          return Geometry::TRIANGLE;
02706       case Element::HEXAHEDRON:
02707          return Geometry::SQUARE;
02708       default:
02709          mfem_error("Mesh::GetFaceBaseGeometry(...) #2");
02710       }
02711    else
02712       return faces[i]->GetGeometryType();
02713 #endif
02714 }
02715 
02716 int Mesh::GetBdrElementEdgeIndex(int i) const
02717 {
02718    if (Dim == 2)
02719       return be_to_edge[i];
02720    return be_to_face[i];
02721 }
02722 
02723 int Mesh::GetElementType(int i) const
02724 {
02725    Element *El = elements[i];
02726    int t = El->GetType();
02727 
02728    while (1)
02729       if (t == Element::BISECTED     ||
02730           t == Element::QUADRISECTED ||
02731           t == Element::OCTASECTED)
02732          t = (El = ((RefinedElement *) El)->IAm())->GetType();
02733       else
02734          break;
02735    return t;
02736 }
02737 
02738 int Mesh::GetBdrElementType(int i) const
02739 {
02740    Element *El = boundary[i];
02741    int t = El->GetType();
02742 
02743    while (1)
02744       if (t == Element::BISECTED || t == Element::QUADRISECTED)
02745          t = (El = ((RefinedElement *) El)->IAm())->GetType();
02746       else
02747          break;
02748    return t;
02749 }
02750 
02751 void Mesh::GetPointMatrix(int i, DenseMatrix &pointmat) const
02752 {
02753    int k, j, nv;
02754    const int *v;
02755 
02756    v  = elements[i]->GetVertices();
02757    nv = elements[i]->GetNVertices();
02758 
02759    pointmat.SetSize(Dim, nv);
02760    for (k = 0; k < Dim; k++)
02761       for (j = 0; j < nv; j++)
02762          pointmat(k, j) = vertices[v[j]](k);
02763 }
02764 
02765 void Mesh::GetBdrPointMatrix(int i,DenseMatrix &pointmat) const
02766 {
02767    int k, j, nv;
02768    const int *v;
02769 
02770    v  = boundary[i]->GetVertices();
02771    nv = boundary[i]->GetNVertices();
02772 
02773    pointmat.SetSize(Dim, nv);
02774    for (k = 0; k < Dim; k++)
02775       for (j = 0; j < nv; j++)
02776          pointmat(k, j) = vertices[v[j]](k);
02777 }
02778 
02779 double Mesh::GetLength(int i, int j) const
02780 {
02781    const double *vi = vertices[i]();
02782    const double *vj = vertices[j]();
02783    double length = 0.;
02784 
02785    for (int k = 0; k < Dim; k++)
02786       length += (vi[k]-vj[k])*(vi[k]-vj[k]);
02787 
02788    return sqrt(length);
02789 }
02790 
02791 // static method
02792 void Mesh::GetElementArrayEdgeTable(const Array<Element*> &elem_array,
02793                                     const DSTable &v_to_v, Table &el_to_edge)
02794 {
02795    el_to_edge.MakeI(elem_array.Size());
02796    for (int i = 0; i < elem_array.Size(); i++)
02797    {
02798       el_to_edge.AddColumnsInRow(i, elem_array[i]->GetNEdges());
02799    }
02800    el_to_edge.MakeJ();
02801    for (int i = 0; i < elem_array.Size(); i++)
02802    {
02803       const int *v = elem_array[i]->GetVertices();
02804       const int ne = elem_array[i]->GetNEdges();
02805       for (int j = 0; j < ne; j++)
02806       {
02807          const int *e = elem_array[i]->GetEdgeVertices(j);
02808          el_to_edge.AddConnection(i, v_to_v(v[e[0]], v[e[1]]));
02809       }
02810    }
02811    el_to_edge.ShiftUpI();
02812 }
02813 
02814 void Mesh::GetVertexToVertexTable(DSTable & v_to_v) const
02815 {
02816    for (int i = 0; i < NumOfElements; i++)
02817    {
02818       const int *v = elements[i]->GetVertices();
02819       const int ne = elements[i]->GetNEdges();
02820       for (int j = 0; j < ne; j++)
02821       {
02822          const int *e = elements[i]->GetEdgeVertices(j);
02823          v_to_v.Push(v[e[0]], v[e[1]]);
02824       }
02825    }
02826 }
02827 
02828 int Mesh::GetElementToEdgeTable(Table & e_to_f, Array<int> &be_to_f)
02829 {
02830    int i, NumberOfEdges;
02831 
02832    DSTable v_to_v(NumOfVertices);
02833    GetVertexToVertexTable(v_to_v);
02834 
02835    NumberOfEdges = v_to_v.NumberOfEntries();
02836 
02837    // Fill the element to edge table
02838    GetElementArrayEdgeTable(elements, v_to_v, e_to_f);
02839 
02840    if (Dim == 2)
02841    {
02842       // Initialize the indeces for the boundary elements.
02843       be_to_f.SetSize(NumOfBdrElements);
02844       for (i = 0; i < NumOfBdrElements; i++)
02845       {
02846          const int *v = boundary[i]->GetVertices();
02847          be_to_f[i] = v_to_v(v[0], v[1]);
02848       }
02849    }
02850    else if (Dim == 3)
02851    {
02852       if (bel_to_edge == NULL)
02853          bel_to_edge = new Table;
02854       GetElementArrayEdgeTable(boundary, v_to_v, *bel_to_edge);
02855    }
02856    else
02857       mfem_error("1D GetElementToEdgeTable is not yet implemented.");
02858 
02859    // Return the number of edges
02860    return NumberOfEdges;
02861 }
02862 
02863 const Table & Mesh::ElementToElementTable()
02864 {
02865    if (el_to_el)
02866       return *el_to_el;
02867 
02868    if (Dim == 2)
02869    {
02870       Table edge_el;
02871 
02872       Transpose(ElementToEdgeTable(), edge_el);
02873       el_to_el = new Table(NumOfElements, 4); // 4 is the max. # of edges
02874 
02875       for (int i = 0; i < edge_el.Size(); i++)
02876          if (edge_el.RowSize(i) > 1)
02877          {
02878             const int *el = edge_el.GetRow(i);
02879             el_to_el->Push(el[0], el[1]);
02880             el_to_el->Push(el[1], el[0]);
02881          }
02882 
02883       el_to_el->Finalize();
02884    }
02885    else if (Dim == 3)
02886    {
02887       el_to_el = new Table(NumOfElements, 6); // 6 is the max. # of faces
02888 
02889       for (int i = 0; i < faces_info.Size(); i++)
02890          if (faces_info[i].Elem2No >= 0)
02891          {
02892             el_to_el->Push(faces_info[i].Elem1No, faces_info[i].Elem2No);
02893             el_to_el->Push(faces_info[i].Elem2No, faces_info[i].Elem1No);
02894          }
02895 
02896       el_to_el->Finalize();
02897    }
02898    else
02899       mfem_error("Mesh::ElementToElementTable() in 1D is not implemented!");
02900 
02901    return *el_to_el;
02902 }
02903 
02904 const Table & Mesh::ElementToFaceTable() const
02905 {
02906    if (el_to_face == NULL)
02907       mfem_error("Mesh::ElementToFaceTable()");
02908    return *el_to_face;
02909 }
02910 
02911 const Table & Mesh::ElementToEdgeTable() const
02912 {
02913    if (el_to_edge == NULL)
02914       mfem_error("Mesh::ElementToEdgeTable()");
02915    return *el_to_edge;
02916 }
02917 
02918 void Mesh::AddSegmentFaceElement(int lf, int gf, int el, int v0, int v1)
02919 {
02920    if (faces[gf] == NULL)  // this will be elem1
02921    {
02922       faces[gf] = new Segment(v0, v1);
02923       faces_info[gf].Elem1No  = el;
02924       faces_info[gf].Elem1Inf = 64 * lf; // face lf with orientation 0
02925       faces_info[gf].Elem2No  = -1; // in case there's no other side
02926    }
02927    else  //  this will be elem2
02928    {
02929 #ifdef MFEM_DEBUG
02930       int *v = faces[gf]->GetVertices();
02931       if (v[1] != v0 || v[0] != v1)
02932          mfem_error("Mesh::AddSegmentFaceElement(...)");
02933 #endif
02934       faces_info[gf].Elem2No  = el;
02935       faces_info[gf].Elem2Inf = 64 * lf + 1;
02936    }
02937 }
02938 
02939 void Mesh::AddTriangleFaceElement(int lf, int gf, int el,
02940                                   int v0, int v1, int v2)
02941 {
02942    if (faces[gf] == NULL)  // this will be elem1
02943    {
02944       faces[gf] = new Triangle(v0, v1, v2);
02945       faces_info[gf].Elem1No  = el;
02946       faces_info[gf].Elem1Inf = 64 * lf; // face lf with orientation 0
02947       faces_info[gf].Elem2No  = -1; // in case there's no other side
02948    }
02949    else  //  this will be elem2
02950    {
02951       int orientation, vv[3] = { v0, v1, v2 };
02952       orientation = GetTriOrientation(faces[gf]->GetVertices(), vv);
02953 #ifdef MFEM_DEBUG
02954       if (orientation % 2 == 0)
02955          mfem_error("Mesh::AddTriangleFaceElement(...)");
02956 #endif
02957       faces_info[gf].Elem2No  = el;
02958       faces_info[gf].Elem2Inf = 64 * lf + orientation;
02959    }
02960 }
02961 
02962 void Mesh::AddQuadFaceElement(int lf, int gf, int el,
02963                               int v0, int v1, int v2, int v3)
02964 {
02965    if (faces_info[gf].Elem1No < 0)  // this will be elem1
02966    {
02967       faces[gf] = new Quadrilateral(v0, v1, v2, v3);
02968       faces_info[gf].Elem1No  = el;
02969       faces_info[gf].Elem1Inf = 64 * lf; // face lf with orientation 0
02970       faces_info[gf].Elem2No  = -1; // in case there's no other side
02971    }
02972    else  //  this will be elem2
02973    {
02974       int vv[4] = { v0, v1, v2, v3 };
02975       int oo = GetQuadOrientation(faces[gf]->GetVertices(), vv);
02976 #ifdef MFEM_DEBUG
02977       if (oo % 2 == 0)
02978          mfem_error("Mesh::AddQuadFaceElement(...)");
02979 #endif
02980       faces_info[gf].Elem2No  = el;
02981       faces_info[gf].Elem2Inf = 64 * lf + oo;
02982    }
02983 }
02984 
02985 void Mesh::GenerateFaces()
02986 {
02987    int i, nfaces;
02988 
02989    nfaces = (Dim == 2) ? NumOfEdges : NumOfFaces;
02990 
02991    for (i = 0; i < faces.Size(); i++)
02992       FreeElement(faces[i]);
02993 
02994    // (re)generate the interior faces and the info for them
02995    faces.SetSize(nfaces);
02996    faces_info.SetSize(nfaces);
02997    for (i = 0; i < nfaces; i++)
02998    {
02999       faces[i] = NULL;
03000       faces_info[i].Elem1No = -1;
03001    }
03002    for (i = 0; i < NumOfElements; i++)
03003    {
03004       const int *v = elements[i]->GetVertices();
03005       const int *ef;
03006       if (Dim == 2)
03007       {
03008          ef = el_to_edge->GetRow(i);
03009          const int ne = elements[i]->GetNEdges();
03010          for (int j = 0; j < ne; j++)
03011          {
03012             const int *e = elements[i]->GetEdgeVertices(j);
03013             AddSegmentFaceElement(j, ef[j], i, v[e[1]], v[e[0]]);
03014          }
03015       }
03016       else
03017       {
03018          ef = el_to_face->GetRow(i);
03019          switch (GetElementType(i))
03020          {
03021          case Element::TETRAHEDRON:
03022             AddTriangleFaceElement(0, ef[0], i, v[1], v[2], v[3]);
03023             AddTriangleFaceElement(1, ef[1], i, v[0], v[3], v[2]);
03024             AddTriangleFaceElement(2, ef[2], i, v[0], v[1], v[3]);
03025             AddTriangleFaceElement(3, ef[3], i, v[0], v[2], v[1]);
03026             break;
03027          case Element::HEXAHEDRON:
03028             AddQuadFaceElement(0, ef[0], i, v[3], v[2], v[1], v[0]);
03029             AddQuadFaceElement(1, ef[1], i, v[0], v[1], v[5], v[4]);
03030             AddQuadFaceElement(2, ef[2], i, v[1], v[2], v[6], v[5]);
03031             AddQuadFaceElement(3, ef[3], i, v[2], v[3], v[7], v[6]);
03032             AddQuadFaceElement(4, ef[4], i, v[3], v[0], v[4], v[7]);
03033             AddQuadFaceElement(5, ef[5], i, v[4], v[5], v[6], v[7]);
03034             break;
03035          }
03036       }
03037    }
03038 }
03039 
03040 STable3D *Mesh::GetFacesTable()
03041 {
03042    STable3D *faces_tbl = new STable3D(NumOfVertices);
03043    for (int i = 0; i < NumOfElements; i++)
03044    {
03045       const int *v = elements[i]->GetVertices();
03046       switch (GetElementType(i))
03047       {
03048       case Element::TETRAHEDRON:
03049          faces_tbl->Push(v[1], v[2], v[3]);
03050          faces_tbl->Push(v[0], v[3], v[2]);
03051          faces_tbl->Push(v[0], v[1], v[3]);
03052          faces_tbl->Push(v[0], v[2], v[1]);
03053          break;
03054       case Element::HEXAHEDRON:
03055          // find the face by the vertices with the smallest 3 numbers
03056          // z = 0, y = 0, x = 1, y = 1, x = 0, z = 1
03057          faces_tbl->Push4(v[3], v[2], v[1], v[0]);
03058          faces_tbl->Push4(v[0], v[1], v[5], v[4]);
03059          faces_tbl->Push4(v[1], v[2], v[6], v[5]);
03060          faces_tbl->Push4(v[2], v[3], v[7], v[6]);
03061          faces_tbl->Push4(v[3], v[0], v[4], v[7]);
03062          faces_tbl->Push4(v[4], v[5], v[6], v[7]);
03063          break;
03064       }
03065    }
03066    return faces_tbl;
03067 }
03068 
03069 STable3D *Mesh::GetElementToFaceTable(int ret_ftbl)
03070 {
03071    int i, *v;
03072    STable3D *faces_tbl;
03073 
03074    if (el_to_face != NULL)
03075       delete el_to_face;
03076    el_to_face = new Table(NumOfElements, 6);  // must be 6 for hexahedra
03077    faces_tbl = new STable3D(NumOfVertices);
03078    for (i = 0; i < NumOfElements; i++)
03079    {
03080       v = elements[i]->GetVertices();
03081       switch (GetElementType(i))
03082       {
03083       case Element::TETRAHEDRON:
03084          el_to_face->Push(i, faces_tbl->Push(v[1], v[2], v[3]));
03085          el_to_face->Push(i, faces_tbl->Push(v[0], v[3], v[2]));
03086          el_to_face->Push(i, faces_tbl->Push(v[0], v[1], v[3]));
03087          el_to_face->Push(i, faces_tbl->Push(v[0], v[2], v[1]));
03088          break;
03089       case Element::HEXAHEDRON:
03090          // find the face by the vertices with the smallest 3 numbers
03091          // z = 0, y = 0, x = 1, y = 1, x = 0, z = 1
03092          el_to_face->Push(i, faces_tbl->Push4(v[3], v[2], v[1], v[0]));
03093          el_to_face->Push(i, faces_tbl->Push4(v[0], v[1], v[5], v[4]));
03094          el_to_face->Push(i, faces_tbl->Push4(v[1], v[2], v[6], v[5]));
03095          el_to_face->Push(i, faces_tbl->Push4(v[2], v[3], v[7], v[6]));
03096          el_to_face->Push(i, faces_tbl->Push4(v[3], v[0], v[4], v[7]));
03097          el_to_face->Push(i, faces_tbl->Push4(v[4], v[5], v[6], v[7]));
03098          break;
03099       }
03100    }
03101    el_to_face->Finalize();
03102    NumOfFaces = faces_tbl->NumberOfElements();
03103    be_to_face.SetSize(NumOfBdrElements);
03104    for (i = 0; i < NumOfBdrElements; i++)
03105    {
03106       v = boundary[i]->GetVertices();
03107       switch (GetBdrElementType(i))
03108       {
03109       case Element::TRIANGLE:
03110          be_to_face[i] = (*faces_tbl)(v[0], v[1], v[2]);
03111          break;
03112       case Element::QUADRILATERAL:
03113          be_to_face[i] = (*faces_tbl)(v[0], v[1], v[2], v[3]);
03114          break;
03115       }
03116    }
03117 
03118    if (ret_ftbl)
03119       return faces_tbl;
03120    delete faces_tbl;
03121    return NULL;
03122 }
03123 
03124 #ifdef MFEM_USE_MPI
03125 // auxiliary function for qsort
03126 static int mfem_less(const void *x, const void *y)
03127 {
03128    if (*(int*)x < *(int*)y)
03129       return 1;
03130    if (*(int*)x > *(int*)y)
03131       return -1;
03132    return 0;
03133 }
03134 // METIS prototypes
03135 typedef int idxtype;
03136 extern "C" {
03137    void METIS_PartGraphRecursive(int*, idxtype*, idxtype*, idxtype*, idxtype*,
03138                                  int*, int*, int*, int*, int*, idxtype*);
03139    void METIS_PartGraphKway(int*, idxtype*, idxtype*, idxtype*, idxtype*,
03140                             int*, int*, int*, int*, int*, idxtype*);
03141    void METIS_PartGraphVKway(int*, idxtype*, idxtype*, idxtype*, idxtype*,
03142                              int*, int*, int*, int*, int*, idxtype*);
03143 }
03144 #endif
03145 
03146 int *Mesh::GeneratePartitioning(int nparts, int part_method)
03147 {
03148 #ifdef MFEM_USE_MPI
03149    int i, *partitioning;
03150 
03151    ElementToElementTable();
03152 
03153    partitioning = new int[NumOfElements];
03154 
03155    if (nparts == 1)
03156    {
03157       for (i = 0; i < NumOfElements; i++)
03158          partitioning[i] = 0;
03159    }
03160    else
03161    {
03162       int *I, *J, n;
03163       int wgtflag = 0;
03164       int numflag = 0;
03165       int options[5];
03166       int edgecut;
03167 
03168       n = NumOfElements;
03169       I = el_to_el->GetI();
03170       J = el_to_el->GetJ();
03171       options[0] = 0;
03172 
03173       // Sort the neighbor lists
03174       if (part_method >= 0 && part_method <= 2)
03175          for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
03176             qsort(&J[I[i]], I[i+1]-I[i], sizeof(int), &mfem_less);
03177 
03178       // This function should be used to partition a graph into a small
03179       // number of partitions (less than 8).
03180       if (part_method == 0 || part_method == 3)
03181          METIS_PartGraphRecursive(&n,
03182                                   (idxtype *) I,
03183                                   (idxtype *) J,
03184                                   (idxtype *) NULL,
03185                                   (idxtype *) NULL,
03186                                   &wgtflag,
03187                                   &numflag,
03188                                   &nparts,
03189                                   options,
03190                                   &edgecut,
03191                                   (idxtype *) partitioning);
03192 
03193       // This function should be used to partition a graph into a large
03194       // number of partitions (greater than 8).
03195       if (part_method == 1 || part_method == 4)
03196          METIS_PartGraphKway(&n,
03197                              (idxtype *) I,
03198                              (idxtype *) J,
03199                              (idxtype *) NULL,
03200                              (idxtype *) NULL,
03201                              &wgtflag,
03202                              &numflag,
03203                              &nparts,
03204                              options,
03205                              &edgecut,
03206                              (idxtype *) partitioning);
03207 
03208       // The objective of this partitioning is to minimize the total
03209       // communication volume
03210       if (part_method == 2 || part_method == 5)
03211          METIS_PartGraphVKway(&n,
03212                               (idxtype *) I,
03213                               (idxtype *) J,
03214                               (idxtype *) NULL,
03215                               (idxtype *) NULL,
03216                               &wgtflag,
03217                               &numflag,
03218                               &nparts,
03219                               options,
03220                               &edgecut,
03221                               (idxtype *) partitioning);
03222 
03223 #ifdef MFEM_DEBUG
03224       cout << "Mesh::GeneratePartitioning(...): edgecut = "
03225            << edgecut << endl;
03226 #endif
03227    }
03228 
03229    if (el_to_el)
03230       delete el_to_el;
03231    el_to_el = NULL;
03232 
03233    // Check for empty partitionings (a "feature" in METIS)
03234    {
03235       Array< Pair<int,int> > psize(nparts);
03236       for (i = 0; i < nparts; i++)
03237       {
03238          psize[i].one = 0;
03239          psize[i].two = i;
03240       }
03241 
03242       for (i = 0; i < NumOfElements; i++)
03243          psize[partitioning[i]].one++;
03244 
03245       int empty_parts = 0;
03246       for (i = 0; i < nparts; i++)
03247          if (psize[i].one == 0)
03248             empty_parts++;
03249 
03250       // This code just split the largest partitionings in two.
03251       // Do we need to replace it with something better?
03252       if (empty_parts)
03253       {
03254          cerr << "Mesh::GeneratePartitioning returned " << empty_parts
03255               << " empty parts!" << endl;
03256 
03257          SortPairs<int,int>(psize, nparts);
03258 
03259          for (i = nparts-1; i > nparts-1-empty_parts; i--)
03260             psize[i].one /= 2;
03261 
03262          for (int j = 0; j < NumOfElements; j++)
03263             for (i = nparts-1; i > nparts-1-empty_parts; i--)
03264                if (psize[i].one == 0 || partitioning[j] != psize[i].two)
03265                   continue;
03266                else
03267                {
03268                   partitioning[j] = psize[nparts-1-i].two;
03269                   psize[i].one--;
03270                }
03271       }
03272    }
03273 
03274    return partitioning;
03275 
03276 #else
03277 
03278    mfem_error("Mesh::GeneratePartitioning(...): "
03279               "MFEM was compiled without Metis.");
03280 
03281    return NULL;
03282 
03283 #endif
03284 }
03285 
03286 /* required: 0 <= partitioning[i] < num_part */
03287 void FindPartitioningComponents(Table &elem_elem,
03288                                 const Array<int> &partitioning,
03289                                 Array<int> &component,
03290                                 Array<int> &num_comp)
03291 {
03292    int i, j, k;
03293    int num_elem, *i_elem_elem, *j_elem_elem;
03294 
03295    num_elem    = elem_elem.Size();
03296    i_elem_elem = elem_elem.GetI();
03297    j_elem_elem = elem_elem.GetJ();
03298 
03299    component.SetSize(num_elem);
03300 
03301    Array<int> elem_stack(num_elem);
03302    int stack_p, stack_top_p, elem;
03303    int num_part;
03304 
03305    num_part = -1;
03306    for (i = 0; i < num_elem; i++)
03307    {
03308       if (partitioning[i] > num_part)
03309          num_part = partitioning[i];
03310       component[i] = -1;
03311    }
03312    num_part++;
03313 
03314    num_comp.SetSize(num_part);
03315    for (i = 0; i < num_part; i++)
03316       num_comp[i] = 0;
03317 
03318    stack_p = 0;
03319    stack_top_p = 0;  // points to the first unused element in the stack
03320    for (elem = 0; elem < num_elem; elem++)
03321    {
03322       if (component[elem] >= 0)
03323          continue;
03324 
03325       component[elem] = num_comp[partitioning[elem]]++;
03326 
03327       elem_stack[stack_top_p++] = elem;
03328 
03329       for ( ; stack_p < stack_top_p; stack_p++)
03330       {
03331          i = elem_stack[stack_p];
03332          for (j = i_elem_elem[i]; j < i_elem_elem[i+1]; j++)
03333          {
03334             k = j_elem_elem[j];
03335             if (partitioning[k] == partitioning[i])
03336                if (component[k] < 0)
03337                {
03338                   component[k] = component[i];
03339                   elem_stack[stack_top_p++] = k;
03340                }
03341                else if (component[k] != component[i])
03342                {
03343                   mfem_error("FindPartitioningComponents");
03344                }
03345          }
03346       }
03347    }
03348 }
03349 
03350 void Mesh::CheckPartitioning(int *partitioning)
03351 {
03352    int i, n_empty, n_mcomp;
03353    Array<int> component, num_comp;
03354    const Array<int> _partitioning(partitioning, GetNE());
03355 
03356    ElementToElementTable();
03357 
03358    FindPartitioningComponents(*el_to_el, _partitioning, component, num_comp);
03359 
03360    n_empty = n_mcomp = 0;
03361    for (i = 0; i < num_comp.Size(); i++)
03362       if (num_comp[i] == 0)
03363          n_empty++;
03364       else if (num_comp[i] > 1)
03365          n_mcomp++;
03366 
03367    if (n_empty > 0)
03368    {
03369       cout << "Mesh::CheckPartitioning(...) :\n"
03370            << "The following subdomains are empty :\n";
03371       for (i = 0; i < num_comp.Size(); i++)
03372          if (num_comp[i] == 0)
03373             cout << ' ' << i;
03374       cout << endl;
03375    }
03376    if (n_mcomp > 0)
03377    {
03378       cout << "Mesh::CheckPartitioning(...) :\n"
03379            << "The following subdomains are NOT connected :\n";
03380       for (i = 0; i < num_comp.Size(); i++)
03381          if (num_comp[i] > 1)
03382             cout << ' ' << i;
03383       cout << endl;
03384    }
03385    if (n_empty == 0 && n_mcomp == 0)
03386       cout << "Mesh::CheckPartitioning(...) : "
03387          "All subdomains are connected." << endl;
03388 
03389    if (el_to_el)
03390       delete el_to_el;
03391    el_to_el = NULL;
03392 }
03393 
03394 // compute the coefficients of the polynomial in t:
03395 //   c(0)+c(1)*t+...+c(d)*t^d = det(A+t*B)
03396 // where A, B are (d x d), d=2,3
03397 void DetOfLinComb(const DenseMatrix &A, const DenseMatrix &B, Vector &c)
03398 {
03399    const double *a = A.Data();
03400    const double *b = B.Data();
03401 
03402    c.SetSize(A.Size()+1);
03403    switch (A.Size())
03404    {
03405    case 2:
03406    {
03407       // det(A+t*B) = |a0 a2|   / |a0 b2| + |b0 a2| \
03408       //              |a1 a3| + \ |a1 b3|   |b1 a3| / * t +
03409       //              |b0 b2|
03410       //              |b1 b3| * t^2
03411       c(0) = a[0]*a[3]-a[1]*a[2];
03412       c(1) = a[0]*b[3]-a[1]*b[2]+b[0]*a[3]-b[1]*a[2];
03413       c(2) = b[0]*b[3]-b[1]*b[2];
03414    }
03415    break;
03416 
03417    case 3:
03418    {
03419       //              |a0 a3 a6|
03420       // det(A+t*B) = |a1 a4 a7| +
03421       //              |a2 a5 a8|
03422 
03423       //  /  |b0 a3 a6|   |a0 b3 a6|   |a0 a3 b6| \
03424       //  |  |b1 a4 a7| + |a1 b4 a7| + |a1 a4 b7| | * t +
03425       //  \  |b2 a5 a8|   |a2 b5 a8|   |a2 a5 b8| /
03426 
03427       //  /  |a0 b3 b6|   |b0 a3 b6|   |b0 b3 a6| \
03428       //  |  |a1 b4 b7| + |b1 a4 b7| + |b1 b4 a7| | * t^2 +
03429       //  \  |a2 b5 b8|   |b2 a5 b8|   |b2 b5 a8| /
03430 
03431       //  |b0 b3 b6|
03432       //  |b1 b4 b7| * t^3
03433       //  |b2 b5 b8|
03434       c(0) = (a[0] * (a[4] * a[8] - a[5] * a[7]) +
03435               a[1] * (a[5] * a[6] - a[3] * a[8]) +
03436               a[2] * (a[3] * a[7] - a[4] * a[6]));
03437 
03438       c(1) = (b[0] * (a[4] * a[8] - a[5] * a[7]) +
03439               b[1] * (a[5] * a[6] - a[3] * a[8]) +
03440               b[2] * (a[3] * a[7] - a[4] * a[6]) +
03441 
03442               a[0] * (b[4] * a[8] - b[5] * a[7]) +
03443               a[1] * (b[5] * a[6] - b[3] * a[8]) +
03444               a[2] * (b[3] * a[7] - b[4] * a[6]) +
03445 
03446               a[0] * (a[4] * b[8] - a[5] * b[7]) +
03447               a[1] * (a[5] * b[6] - a[3] * b[8]) +
03448               a[2] * (a[3] * b[7] - a[4] * b[6]));
03449 
03450       c(2) = (a[0] * (b[4] * b[8] - b[5] * b[7]) +
03451               a[1] * (b[5] * b[6] - b[3] * b[8]) +
03452               a[2] * (b[3] * b[7] - b[4] * b[6]) +
03453 
03454               b[0] * (a[4] * b[8] - a[5] * b[7]) +
03455               b[1] * (a[5] * b[6] - a[3] * b[8]) +
03456               b[2] * (a[3] * b[7] - a[4] * b[6]) +
03457 
03458               b[0] * (b[4] * a[8] - b[5] * a[7]) +
03459               b[1] * (b[5] * a[6] - b[3] * a[8]) +
03460               b[2] * (b[3] * a[7] - b[4] * a[6]));
03461 
03462       c(3) = (b[0] * (b[4] * b[8] - b[5] * b[7]) +
03463               b[1] * (b[5] * b[6] - b[3] * b[8]) +
03464               b[2] * (b[3] * b[7] - b[4] * b[6]));
03465    }
03466    break;
03467 
03468    default:
03469       mfem_error("DetOfLinComb(...)");
03470    }
03471 }
03472 
03473 inline void swap(double &a, double &b)
03474 {
03475    const double t = a;
03476    a = b;
03477    b = t;
03478 }
03479 
03480 // compute the real roots of
03481 //   z(0)+z(1)*x+...+z(d)*x^d = 0,  d=2,3;
03482 // the roots are returned in x, sorted in increasing order;
03483 // it is assumed that x is at least if size d;
03484 // return the number of roots counting multiplicity;
03485 // return -1 if all z(i) are 0.
03486 int FindRoots(const Vector &z, Vector &x)
03487 {
03488    int d = z.Size()-1;
03489    if (d > 3 || d < 0)
03490       mfem_error("FindRoots(...)");
03491 
03492    while (z(d) == 0.0)
03493    {
03494       if (d == 0)
03495          return(-1);
03496       d--;
03497    }
03498    switch (d)
03499    {
03500    case 0:
03501    {
03502       return 0;
03503    }
03504 
03505    case 1:
03506    {
03507       x(0) = -z(0)/z(1);
03508       return 1;
03509    }
03510 
03511    case 2:
03512    {
03513       double a = z(2), b = z(1), c = z(0);
03514       double D = b*b-4*a*c;
03515       if (D < 0.0)
03516       {
03517          return 0;
03518       }
03519       if (D == 0.0)
03520       {
03521          x(0) = x(1) = -0.5 * b / a;
03522          return 2; // root with multiplicity 2
03523       }
03524       if (b == 0.0)
03525       {
03526          x(0) = -(x(1) = fabs(0.5 * sqrt(D) / a));
03527          return 2;
03528       }
03529       else
03530       {
03531          double t;
03532          if (b > 0.0)
03533             t = -0.5 * (b + sqrt(D));
03534          else
03535             t = -0.5 * (b - sqrt(D));
03536          x(0) = t / a;
03537          x(1) = c / t;
03538          if (x(0) > x(1))
03539             swap(x(0), x(1));
03540          return 2;
03541       }
03542    }
03543 
03544    case 3:
03545    {
03546       double a = z(2)/z(3), b = z(1)/z(3), c = z(0)/z(3);
03547 
03548       // find the real roots of x^3 + a x^2 + b x + c = 0
03549       double Q = (a * a - 3 * b) / 9;
03550       double R = (2 * a * a * a - 9 * a * b + 27 * c) / 54;
03551       double Q3 = Q * Q * Q;
03552       double R2 = R * R;
03553 
03554       if (R2 == Q3)
03555       {
03556          if (Q == 0)
03557          {
03558             x(0) = x(1) = x(2) = - a / 3;
03559          }
03560          else
03561          {
03562             double sqrtQ = sqrt(Q);
03563 
03564             if (R > 0)
03565             {
03566                x(0) = -2 * sqrtQ - a / 3;
03567                x(1) = x(2) = sqrtQ - a / 3;
03568             }
03569             else
03570             {
03571                x(0) = x(1) = - sqrtQ - a / 3;
03572                x(2) = 2 * sqrtQ - a / 3;
03573             }
03574          }
03575          return 3;
03576       }
03577       else if (R2 < Q3)
03578       {
03579          double theta = acos(R / sqrt(Q3));
03580          double A = -2 * sqrt(Q);
03581          double x0, x1, x2;
03582          x0 = A * cos(theta / 3) - a / 3;
03583          x1 = A * cos((theta + 2.0 * M_PI) / 3) - a / 3;
03584          x2 = A * cos((theta - 2.0 * M_PI) / 3) - a / 3;
03585 
03586          /* Sort x0, x1, x2 */
03587          if (x0 > x1)
03588             swap(x0, x1);
03589          if (x1 > x2)
03590          {
03591             swap(x1, x2);
03592             if (x0 > x1)
03593                swap(x0, x1);
03594          }
03595          x(0) = x0;
03596          x(1) = x1;
03597          x(2) = x2;
03598          return 3;
03599       }
03600       else
03601       {
03602          double A;
03603          if (R >= 0.0)
03604             A = -pow(sqrt(R2 - Q3) + R, 1.0/3.0);
03605          else
03606             A =  pow(sqrt(R2 - Q3) - R, 1.0/3.0);
03607          x(0) = A + Q / A - a / 3;
03608          return 1;
03609       }
03610    }
03611    }
03612    return 0;
03613 }
03614 
03615 void FindTMax(Vector &c, Vector &x, double &tmax,
03616               const double factor, const int Dim)
03617 {
03618    const double c0 = c(0);
03619    c(0) = c0 * (1.0 - pow(factor, -Dim));
03620    int nr = FindRoots(c, x);
03621    for (int j = 0; j < nr; j++)
03622    {
03623       if (x(j) > tmax)
03624          break;
03625       if (x(j) >= 0.0)
03626       {
03627          tmax = x(j);
03628          break;
03629       }
03630    }
03631    c(0) = c0 * (1.0 - pow(factor, Dim));
03632    nr = FindRoots(c, x);
03633    for (int j = 0; j < nr; j++)
03634    {
03635       if (x(j) > tmax)
03636          break;
03637       if (x(j) >= 0.0)
03638       {
03639          tmax = x(j);
03640          break;
03641       }
03642    }
03643 }
03644 
03645 void Mesh::CheckDisplacements(const Vector &displacements, double &tmax)
03646 {
03647    int nvs = vertices.Size();
03648    DenseMatrix P, V, DS, PDS(Dim), VDS(Dim);
03649    Vector c(Dim+1), x(Dim);
03650    const double factor = 2.0;
03651 
03652    // check for tangling assuming constant speed
03653    if (tmax < 1.0)
03654       tmax = 1.0;
03655    for (int i = 0; i < NumOfElements; i++)
03656    {
03657       Element *el = elements[i];
03658       int nv = el->GetNVertices();
03659       int *v = el->GetVertices();
03660       P.SetSize(Dim, nv);
03661       V.SetSize(Dim, nv);
03662       for (int j = 0; j < Dim; j++)
03663          for (int k = 0; k < nv; k++)
03664          {
03665             P(j, k) = vertices[v[k]](j);
03666             V(j, k) = displacements(v[k]+j*nvs);
03667          }
03668       DS.SetSize(nv, Dim);
03669       const FiniteElement *fe =
03670          GetTransformationFEforElementType(el->GetType());
03671       // check if  det(P.DShape+t*V.DShape) > 0 for all x and 0<=t<=1
03672       switch (el->GetType())
03673       {
03674       case Element::TRIANGLE:
03675       case Element::TETRAHEDRON:
03676       {
03677          // DS is constant
03678          fe->CalcDShape(Geometries.GetCenter(fe->GetGeomType()), DS);
03679          Mult(P, DS, PDS);
03680          Mult(V, DS, VDS);
03681          DetOfLinComb(PDS, VDS, c);
03682          if (c(0) <= 0.0)
03683             tmax = 0.0;
03684          else
03685             FindTMax(c, x, tmax, factor, Dim);
03686       }
03687       break;
03688 
03689       case Element::QUADRILATERAL:
03690       {
03691          const IntegrationRule &ir = fe->GetNodes();
03692          for (int j = 0; j < nv; j++)
03693          {
03694             fe->CalcDShape(ir.IntPoint(j), DS);
03695             Mult(P, DS, PDS);
03696             Mult(V, DS, VDS);
03697             DetOfLinComb(PDS, VDS, c);
03698             if (c(0) <= 0.0)
03699                tmax = 0.0;
03700             else
03701                FindTMax(c, x, tmax, factor, Dim);
03702          }
03703       }
03704       break;
03705 
03706       default:
03707          mfem_error("Mesh::CheckDisplacements(...)");
03708       }
03709    }
03710 }
03711 
03712 void Mesh::MoveVertices(const Vector &displacements)
03713 {
03714    for (int i = 0, nv = vertices.Size(); i < nv; i++)
03715       for (int j = 0; j < Dim; j++)
03716          vertices[i](j) += displacements(j*nv+i);
03717 }
03718 
03719 void Mesh::GetVertices(Vector &vert_coord) const
03720 {
03721    int nv = vertices.Size();
03722    vert_coord.SetSize(nv*Dim);
03723    for (int i = 0; i < nv; i++)
03724       for (int j = 0; j < Dim; j++)
03725          vert_coord(j*nv+i) = vertices[i](j);
03726 }
03727 
03728 void Mesh::SetVertices(const Vector &vert_coord)
03729 {
03730    for (int i = 0, nv = vertices.Size(); i < nv; i++)
03731       for (int j = 0; j < Dim; j++)
03732          vertices[i](j) = vert_coord(j*nv+i);
03733 }
03734 
03735 void Mesh::MoveNodes(const Vector &displacements)
03736 {
03737    if (Nodes)
03738       (*Nodes) += displacements;
03739    else
03740       MoveVertices(displacements);
03741 }
03742 
03743 void Mesh::GetNodes(Vector &node_coord) const
03744 {
03745    if (Nodes)
03746       node_coord = (*Nodes);
03747    else
03748       GetVertices(node_coord);
03749 }
03750 
03751 void Mesh::SetNodes(const Vector &node_coord)
03752 {
03753    if (Nodes)
03754       (*Nodes) = node_coord;
03755    else
03756       SetVertices(node_coord);
03757 }
03758 
03759 void Mesh::NewNodes(GridFunction &nodes)
03760 {
03761    if (own_nodes) delete Nodes;
03762    Nodes = &nodes;
03763    own_nodes = 0;
03764 }
03765 
03766 void Mesh::AverageVertices(int * indexes, int n, int result)
03767 {
03768    int j, k;
03769 
03770    for (k = 0; k < Dim; k++)
03771       vertices[result](k) = vertices[indexes[0]](k);
03772 
03773    for (j = 1; j < n; j++)
03774       for (k = 0; k < Dim; k++)
03775          vertices[result](k) += vertices[indexes[j]](k);
03776 
03777    for (k = 0; k < Dim; k++)
03778       vertices[result](k) *= (1.0 / n);
03779 }
03780 
03781 void Mesh::UpdateNodes()
03782 {
03783    FiniteElementSpace *cfes = Nodes->FESpace()->SaveUpdate();
03784    SparseMatrix *R =
03785       Nodes->FESpace()->GlobalRestrictionMatrix(cfes, 0);
03786    delete cfes;
03787    {
03788       Vector cNodes = *Nodes;
03789       Nodes->Update();
03790       R->MultTranspose(cNodes, *Nodes);
03791    }
03792    delete R;
03793 
03794    SetState(Mesh::TWO_LEVEL_FINE);
03795 
03796    // update the vertices?
03797 }
03798 
03799 void Mesh::QuadUniformRefinement()
03800 {
03801    int i, j, *v, vv[2], attr, wtls = WantTwoLevelState;
03802    const int *e;
03803 
03804    if (Nodes)  // curved mesh
03805    {
03806       UseTwoLevelState(1);
03807    }
03808 
03809    SetState(Mesh::NORMAL);
03810 
03811    if (el_to_edge == NULL)
03812    {
03813       el_to_edge = new Table;
03814       NumOfEdges = GetElementToEdgeTable(*el_to_edge, be_to_edge);
03815    }
03816 
03817    int oedge = NumOfVertices;
03818    int oelem = oedge + NumOfEdges;
03819 
03820    DeleteCoarseTables();
03821 
03822    vertices.SetSize(oelem + NumOfElements);
03823 
03824    for (i = 0; i < NumOfElements; i++)
03825    {
03826       v = elements[i]->GetVertices();
03827 
03828       AverageVertices(v, 4, oelem+i);
03829 
03830       e = el_to_edge->GetRow(i);
03831 
03832       vv[0] = v[0], vv[1] = v[1]; AverageVertices(vv, 2, oedge+e[0]);
03833       vv[0] = v[1], vv[1] = v[2]; AverageVertices(vv, 2, oedge+e[1]);
03834       vv[0] = v[2], vv[1] = v[3]; AverageVertices(vv, 2, oedge+e[2]);
03835       vv[0] = v[3], vv[1] = v[0]; AverageVertices(vv, 2, oedge+e[3]);
03836    }
03837 
03838    elements.SetSize(4 * NumOfElements);
03839    for (i = 0; i < NumOfElements; i++)
03840    {
03841       attr = elements[i]->GetAttribute();
03842       v = elements[i]->GetVertices();
03843       e = el_to_edge->GetRow(i);
03844       j = NumOfElements + 3 * i;
03845 
03846       elements[j+0] = new Quadrilateral(oedge+e[0], v[1], oedge+e[1],
03847                                         oelem+i, attr);
03848       elements[j+1] = new Quadrilateral(oelem+i, oedge+e[1], v[2],
03849                                         oedge+e[2], attr);
03850       elements[j+2] = new Quadrilateral(oedge+e[3], oelem+i, oedge+e[2],
03851                                         v[3], attr);
03852 
03853       if (WantTwoLevelState)
03854       {
03855          QuadrisectedElement *qe;
03856 
03857          qe = new QuadrisectedElement(elements[i]->Duplicate());
03858          qe->FirstChild = elements[i];
03859          qe->Child2 = j;
03860          qe->Child3 = j+1;
03861          qe->Child4 = j+2;
03862          elements[i] = qe;
03863       }
03864 
03865       v[1] = oedge+e[0];
03866       v[2] = oelem+i;
03867       v[3] = oedge+e[3];
03868    }
03869 
03870    boundary.SetSize(2 * NumOfBdrElements);
03871    for (i = 0; i < NumOfBdrElements; i++)
03872    {
03873       attr = boundary[i]->GetAttribute();
03874       v = boundary[i]->GetVertices();
03875       j = NumOfBdrElements + i;
03876 
03877       boundary[j] = new Segment(oedge+be_to_edge[i], v[1], attr);
03878 
03879       if (WantTwoLevelState)
03880       {
03881 #ifdef MFEM_USE_MEMALLOC
03882          BisectedElement *be = BEMemory.Alloc();
03883 #else
03884          BisectedElement *be = new BisectedElement;
03885 #endif
03886          be->SetCoarseElem(boundary[i]->Duplicate());
03887          be->FirstChild = boundary[i];
03888          be->SecondChild = j;
03889          boundary[i] = be;
03890       }
03891 
03892       v[1] = oedge+be_to_edge[i];
03893    }
03894 
03895    if (WantTwoLevelState)
03896    {
03897       c_NumOfVertices    = NumOfVertices;
03898       c_NumOfEdges       = NumOfEdges;
03899       c_NumOfElements    = NumOfElements;
03900       c_NumOfBdrElements = NumOfBdrElements;
03901 
03902       RefinedElement::State = RefinedElement::FINE;
03903       State = Mesh::TWO_LEVEL_FINE;
03904    }
03905 
03906    NumOfVertices    = oelem + NumOfElements;
03907    NumOfElements    = 4 * NumOfElements;
03908    NumOfBdrElements = 2 * NumOfBdrElements;
03909    NumOfFaces       = 0;
03910 
03911    if (WantTwoLevelState)
03912    {
03913       f_NumOfVertices    = NumOfVertices;
03914       f_NumOfElements    = NumOfElements;
03915       f_NumOfBdrElements = NumOfBdrElements;
03916    }
03917 
03918    if (el_to_edge != NULL)
03919    {
03920       if (WantTwoLevelState)
03921       {
03922          c_el_to_edge = el_to_edge;
03923          Swap(be_to_edge, fc_be_to_edge); // save coarse be_to_edge
03924          f_el_to_edge = new Table;
03925          NumOfEdges = GetElementToEdgeTable(*f_el_to_edge, be_to_edge);
03926          el_to_edge = f_el_to_edge;
03927          f_NumOfEdges = NumOfEdges;
03928       }
03929       else
03930          NumOfEdges = GetElementToEdgeTable(*el_to_edge, be_to_edge);
03931       GenerateFaces();
03932    }
03933 
03934 #ifdef MFEM_DEBUG
03935    CheckElementOrientation();
03936    CheckBdrElementOrientation();
03937 #endif
03938 
03939    if (Nodes)  // curved mesh
03940    {
03941       UpdateNodes();
03942       UseTwoLevelState(wtls);
03943    }
03944 }
03945 
03946 void Mesh::HexUniformRefinement()
03947 {
03948    int i, wtls = WantTwoLevelState;
03949    int * v;
03950    const int *e, *f;
03951    int vv[4];
03952 
03953    if (Nodes)  // curved mesh
03954    {
03955       UseTwoLevelState(1);
03956    }
03957 
03958    SetState(Mesh::NORMAL);
03959 
03960    if (el_to_edge == NULL)
03961    {
03962       el_to_edge = new Table;
03963       NumOfEdges = GetElementToEdgeTable(*el_to_edge, be_to_edge);
03964    }
03965    if (el_to_face == NULL)
03966       GetElementToFaceTable();
03967 
03968    int oedge = NumOfVertices;
03969    int oface = oedge + NumOfEdges;
03970    int oelem = oface + NumOfFaces;
03971 
03972    DeleteCoarseTables();
03973 
03974    vertices.SetSize(oelem + NumOfElements);
03975    for (i = 0; i < NumOfElements; i++)
03976    {
03977       v = elements[i]->GetVertices();
03978 
03979       AverageVertices(v, 8, oelem+i);
03980 
03981       f = el_to_face->GetRow(i);
03982 
03983       vv[0] = v[3], vv[1] = v[2], vv[2] = v[1], vv[3] = v[0];
03984       AverageVertices(vv, 4, oface+f[0]);
03985       vv[0] = v[0], vv[1] = v[1], vv[2] = v[5], vv[3] = v[4];
03986       AverageVertices(vv, 4, oface+f[1]);
03987       vv[0] = v[1], vv[1] = v[2], vv[2] = v[6], vv[3] = v[5];
03988       AverageVertices(vv, 4, oface+f[2]);
03989       vv[0] = v[2], vv[1] = v[3], vv[2] = v[7], vv[3] = v[6];
03990       AverageVertices(vv, 4, oface+f[3]);
03991       vv[0] = v[3], vv[1] = v[0], vv[2] = v[4], vv[3] = v[7];
03992       AverageVertices(vv, 4, oface+f[4]);
03993       vv[0] = v[4], vv[1] = v[5], vv[2] = v[6], vv[3] = v[7];
03994       AverageVertices(vv, 4, oface+f[5]);
03995 
03996       e = el_to_edge->GetRow(i);
03997 
03998       vv[0] = v[0], vv[1] = v[1]; AverageVertices(vv, 2, oedge+e[0]);
03999       vv[0] = v[1], vv[1] = v[2]; AverageVertices(vv, 2, oedge+e[1]);
04000       vv[0] = v[2], vv[1] = v[3]; AverageVertices(vv, 2, oedge+e[2]);
04001       vv[0] = v[3], vv[1] = v[0]; AverageVertices(vv, 2, oedge+e[3]);
04002       vv[0] = v[4], vv[1] = v[5]; AverageVertices(vv, 2, oedge+e[4]);
04003       vv[0] = v[5], vv[1] = v[6]; AverageVertices(vv, 2, oedge+e[5]);
04004       vv[0] = v[6], vv[1] = v[7]; AverageVertices(vv, 2, oedge+e[6]);
04005       vv[0] = v[7], vv[1] = v[4]; AverageVertices(vv, 2, oedge+e[7]);
04006       vv[0] = v[0], vv[1] = v[4]; AverageVertices(vv, 2, oedge+e[8]);
04007       vv[0] = v[1], vv[1] = v[5]; AverageVertices(vv, 2, oedge+e[9]);
04008       vv[0] = v[2], vv[1] = v[6]; AverageVertices(vv, 2, oedge+e[10]);
04009       vv[0] = v[3], vv[1] = v[7]; AverageVertices(vv, 2, oedge+e[11]);
04010    }
04011 
04012    int attr, j, k;
04013    elements.SetSize(8 * NumOfElements);
04014    for (i = 0; i < NumOfElements; i++)
04015    {
04016       attr = elements[i]->GetAttribute();
04017       v = elements[i]->GetVertices();
04018       e = el_to_edge->GetRow(i);
04019       f = el_to_face->GetRow(i);
04020       j = NumOfElements + 7 * i;
04021 
04022       elements[j+0] = new Hexahedron(oedge+e[0], v[1], oedge+e[1], oface+f[0],
04023                                      oface+f[1], oedge+e[9], oface+f[2],
04024                                      oelem+i, attr);
04025       elements[j+1] = new Hexahedron(oface+f[0], oedge+e[1], v[2], oedge+e[2],
04026                                      oelem+i, oface+f[2], oedge+e[10],
04027                                      oface+f[3], attr);
04028       elements[j+2] = new Hexahedron(oedge+e[3], oface+f[0], oedge+e[2], v[3],
04029                                      oface+f[4], oelem+i, oface+f[3],
04030                                      oedge+e[11], attr);
04031       elements[j+3] = new Hexahedron(oedge+e[8], oface+f[1], oelem+i,
04032                                      oface+f[4], v[4], oedge+e[4], oface+f[5],
04033                                      oedge+e[7], attr);
04034       elements[j+4] = new Hexahedron(oface+f[1], oedge+e[9], oface+f[2],
04035                                      oelem+i, oedge+e[4], v[5], oedge+e[5],
04036                                      oface+f[5], attr);
04037       elements[j+5] = new Hexahedron(oelem+i, oface+f[2], oedge+e[10],
04038                                      oface+f[3], oface+f[5], oedge+e[5], v[6],
04039                                      oedge+e[6], attr);
04040       elements[j+6] = new Hexahedron(oface+f[4], oelem+i, oface+f[3],
04041                                      oedge+e[11], oedge+e[7], oface+f[5],
04042                                      oedge+e[6], v[7], attr);
04043 
04044       if (WantTwoLevelState)
04045       {
04046          OctasectedElement *oe;
04047 
04048          oe = new OctasectedElement(elements[i]->Duplicate());
04049          oe->FirstChild = elements[i];
04050          for (k = 0; k < 7; k++)
04051             oe->Child[k] = j + k;
04052          elements[i] = oe;
04053       }
04054 
04055       v[1] = oedge+e[0];
04056       v[2] = oface+f[0];
04057       v[3] = oedge+e[3];
04058       v[4] = oedge+e[8];
04059       v[5] = oface+f[1];
04060       v[6] = oelem+i;
04061       v[7] = oface+f[4];
04062    }
04063 
04064    boundary.SetSize(4 * NumOfBdrElements);
04065    for (i = 0; i < NumOfBdrElements; i++)
04066    {
04067       attr = boundary[i]->GetAttribute();
04068       v = boundary[i]->GetVertices();
04069       e = bel_to_edge->GetRow(i);
04070       f = & be_to_face[i];
04071       j = NumOfBdrElements + 3 * i;
04072 
04073       boundary[j+0] = new Quadrilateral(oedge+e[0], v[1], oedge+e[1],
04074                                         oface+f[0], attr);
04075       boundary[j+1] = new Quadrilateral(oface+f[0], oedge+e[1], v[2],
04076                                         oedge+e[2], attr);
04077       boundary[j+2] = new Quadrilateral(oedge+e[3], oface+f[0], oedge+e[2],
04078                                         v[3], attr);
04079 
04080       if (WantTwoLevelState)
04081       {
04082          QuadrisectedElement *qe;
04083 
04084          qe = new QuadrisectedElement(boundary[i]->Duplicate());
04085          qe->FirstChild = boundary[i];
04086          qe->Child2 = j;
04087          qe->Child3 = j+1;
04088          qe->Child4 = j+2;
04089          boundary[i] = qe;
04090       }
04091 
04092       v[1] = oedge+e[0];
04093       v[2] = oface+f[0];
04094       v[3] = oedge+e[3];
04095    }
04096 
04097    if (WantTwoLevelState)
04098    {
04099       c_NumOfVertices    = NumOfVertices;
04100       c_NumOfEdges       = NumOfEdges;
04101       c_NumOfFaces       = NumOfFaces;
04102       c_NumOfElements    = NumOfElements;
04103       c_NumOfBdrElements = NumOfBdrElements;
04104 
04105       RefinedElement::State = RefinedElement::FINE;
04106       State = Mesh::TWO_LEVEL_FINE;
04107    }
04108 
04109    NumOfVertices    = oelem + NumOfElements;
04110    NumOfElements    = 8 * NumOfElements;
04111    NumOfBdrElements = 4 * NumOfBdrElements;
04112 
04113    if (WantTwoLevelState)
04114    {
04115       f_NumOfVertices    = NumOfVertices;
04116       f_NumOfElements    = NumOfElements;
04117       f_NumOfBdrElements = NumOfBdrElements;
04118    }
04119 
04120    if (el_to_edge != NULL)
04121    {
04122       if (WantTwoLevelState)
04123       {
04124          c_el_to_edge = el_to_edge;
04125          f_el_to_edge = new Table;
04126          c_bel_to_edge = bel_to_edge;
04127          bel_to_edge = NULL;
04128          NumOfEdges = GetElementToEdgeTable(*f_el_to_edge, be_to_edge);
04129          el_to_edge = f_el_to_edge;
04130          f_bel_to_edge = bel_to_edge;
04131          f_NumOfEdges = NumOfEdges;
04132       }
04133       else
04134          NumOfEdges = GetElementToEdgeTable(*el_to_edge, be_to_edge);
04135    }
04136    if (el_to_face != NULL)
04137    {
04138       if (WantTwoLevelState)
04139       {
04140          c_el_to_face = el_to_face;
04141          el_to_face = NULL;
04142          Swap(faces_info, fc_faces_info);
04143       }
04144       GetElementToFaceTable();
04145       GenerateFaces();
04146       if (WantTwoLevelState)
04147       {
04148          f_el_to_face = el_to_face;
04149          f_NumOfFaces = NumOfFaces;
04150       }
04151    }
04152 
04153 #ifdef MFEM_DEBUG
04154    CheckBdrElementOrientation();
04155 #endif
04156 
04157    if (Nodes)  // curved mesh
04158    {
04159       UpdateNodes();
04160       UseTwoLevelState(wtls);
04161    }
04162 
04163    //  When 'WantTwoLevelState' is true the coarse level
04164    //  'be_to_face' and 'faces'
04165    //  are destroyed !!!
04166 }
04167 
04168 void Mesh::LocalRefinement(const Array<int> &marked_el, int type)
04169 {
04170    int i, j, ind, nedges, wtls = WantTwoLevelState;
04171    Array<int> v;
04172 
04173    if (Nodes)  // curved mesh
04174    {
04175       UseTwoLevelState(1);
04176    }
04177 
04178    SetState(Mesh::NORMAL);
04179    DeleteCoarseTables();
04180 
04181    if (Dim == 1) // --------------------------------------------------------
04182    {
04183       int cne = NumOfElements, cnv = NumOfVertices;
04184       NumOfVertices += marked_el.Size();
04185       NumOfElements += marked_el.Size();
04186       vertices.SetSize(NumOfVertices);
04187       elements.SetSize(NumOfElements);
04188       for (j = 0; j < marked_el.Size(); j++)
04189       {
04190          i = marked_el[j];
04191          int *vert = elements[i]->GetVertices();
04192          vertices[cnv+j](0) = 0.5 * ( vertices[vert[0]](0) +
04193                                       vertices[vert[1]](0) );
04194          elements[cne+j] = new Segment(cnv+j, vert[1],
04195                                        elements[i]->GetAttribute());
04196          vert[1] = cnv+j;
04197       }
04198    } // end of 'if (Dim == 1)'
04199    else if (Dim == 2) // ---------------------------------------------------
04200    {
04201       if (WantTwoLevelState)
04202       {
04203          c_NumOfVertices    = NumOfVertices;
04204          c_NumOfEdges       = NumOfEdges;
04205          c_NumOfElements    = NumOfElements;
04206          c_NumOfBdrElements = NumOfBdrElements;
04207       }
04208 
04209       // 1. Get table of vertex to vertex connections.
04210       DSTable v_to_v(NumOfVertices);
04211       GetVertexToVertexTable(v_to_v);
04212 
04213       // 2. Get edge to element connections in arrays edge1 and edge2
04214       nedges = v_to_v.NumberOfEntries();
04215       int *edge1  = new int[nedges];
04216       int *edge2  = new int[nedges];
04217       int *middle = new int[nedges];
04218 
04219       for (i = 0; i < nedges; i++)
04220          edge1[i] = edge2[i] = middle[i] = -1;
04221 
04222       for (i = 0; i < NumOfElements; i++)
04223       {
04224          elements[i]->GetVertices(v);
04225          for (j = 1; j < v.Size(); j++)
04226          {
04227             ind = v_to_v(v[j-1], v[j]);
04228             (edge1[ind] == -1) ? (edge1[ind] = i) : (edge2[ind] = i);
04229          }
04230          ind = v_to_v(v[0], v[v.Size()-1]);
04231          (edge1[ind] == -1) ? (edge1[ind] = i) : (edge2[ind] = i);
04232       }
04233 
04234       // 3. Do the red refinement.
04235       for (i = 0; i < marked_el.Size(); i++)
04236          RedRefinement(marked_el[i], v_to_v, edge1, edge2, middle);
04237 
04238       // 4. Do the green refinement (to get conforming mesh).
04239       int need_refinement;
04240       do
04241       {
04242          need_refinement = 0;
04243          for (i = 0; i < nedges; i++)
04244             if (middle[i] != -1 && edge1[i] != -1)
04245             {
04246                need_refinement = 1;
04247                GreenRefinement(edge1[i], v_to_v, edge1, edge2, middle);
04248             }
04249       }
04250       while (need_refinement == 1);
04251 
04252       // 5. Update the boundary elements.
04253       int v1[2], v2[2], bisect, temp;
04254       temp = NumOfBdrElements;
04255       for (i = 0; i < temp; i++)
04256       {
04257          boundary[i]->GetVertices(v);
04258          bisect = v_to_v(v[0], v[1]);
04259          if (middle[bisect] != -1) // the element was refined (needs updating)
04260          {
04261             if (boundary[i]->GetType() == Element::SEGMENT)
04262             {
04263                v1[0] =           v[0]; v1[1] = middle[bisect];
04264                v2[0] = middle[bisect]; v2[1] =           v[1];
04265 
04266                if (WantTwoLevelState)
04267                {
04268                   boundary.Append(new Segment(v2, boundary[i]->GetAttribute()));
04269 #ifdef MFEM_USE_MEMALLOC
04270                   BisectedElement *aux = BEMemory.Alloc();
04271                   aux->SetCoarseElem(boundary[i]);
04272 #else
04273                   BisectedElement *aux = new BisectedElement(boundary[i]);
04274 #endif
04275                   aux->FirstChild =
04276                      new Segment(v1, boundary[i]->GetAttribute());
04277                   aux->SecondChild = NumOfBdrElements;
04278                   boundary[i] = aux;
04279                   NumOfBdrElements++;
04280                }
04281                else
04282                {
04283                   boundary[i]->SetVertices(v1);
04284                   boundary.Append(new Segment(v2, boundary[i]->GetAttribute()));
04285                }
04286             }
04287             else
04288                mfem_error("Only bisection of segment is implemented"
04289                           " for bdr elem.");
04290          }
04291       }
04292       NumOfBdrElements = boundary.Size();
04293 
04294       // 6. Free the allocated memory.
04295       delete [] edge1;
04296       delete [] edge2;
04297       delete [] middle;
04298 
04299 #ifdef MFEM_DEBUG
04300       CheckElementOrientation();
04301 #endif
04302 
04303       if (WantTwoLevelState)
04304       {
04305          f_NumOfVertices    = NumOfVertices;
04306          f_NumOfElements    = NumOfElements;
04307          f_NumOfBdrElements = NumOfBdrElements;
04308          RefinedElement::State = RefinedElement::FINE;
04309          State = Mesh::TWO_LEVEL_FINE;
04310       }
04311 
04312       if (el_to_edge != NULL)
04313       {
04314          if (WantTwoLevelState)
04315          {
04316             c_el_to_edge = el_to_edge;
04317             Swap(be_to_edge, fc_be_to_edge); // save coarse be_to_edge
04318             f_el_to_edge = new Table;
04319             NumOfEdges = GetElementToEdgeTable(*f_el_to_edge, be_to_edge);
04320             el_to_edge = f_el_to_edge;
04321             f_NumOfEdges = NumOfEdges;
04322          }
04323          else
04324             NumOfEdges = GetElementToEdgeTable(*el_to_edge, be_to_edge);
04325          GenerateFaces();
04326       }
04327 
04328    }
04329    else if (Dim == 3) // ---------------------------------------------------
04330    {
04331       if (WantTwoLevelState)
04332       {
04333          c_NumOfVertices    = NumOfVertices;
04334          c_NumOfEdges       = NumOfEdges;
04335          c_NumOfFaces       = NumOfFaces;
04336          c_NumOfElements    = NumOfElements;
04337          c_NumOfBdrElements = NumOfBdrElements;
04338       }
04339 
04340       // 1. Get table of vertex to vertex connections.
04341       DSTable v_to_v(NumOfVertices);
04342       GetVertexToVertexTable(v_to_v);
04343 
04344       // 2. Get edge to element connections in arrays edge1 and edge2
04345       nedges = v_to_v.NumberOfEntries();
04346       int *middle = new int[nedges];
04347 
04348       for (i = 0; i < nedges; i++)
04349          middle[i] = -1;
04350 
04351       // 3. Do the red refinement.
04352       int ii;
04353       switch (type)
04354       {
04355       case 1:
04356          for (i = 0; i < marked_el.Size(); i++)
04357             Bisection(marked_el[i], v_to_v, NULL, NULL, middle);
04358          break;
04359       case 2:
04360          for (i = 0; i < marked_el.Size(); i++)
04361          {
04362             Bisection(marked_el[i], v_to_v, NULL, NULL, middle);
04363 
04364             Bisection(NumOfElements - 1, v_to_v, NULL, NULL, middle);
04365             Bisection(marked_el[i], v_to_v, NULL, NULL, middle);
04366          }
04367          break;
04368       case 3:
04369          for (i = 0; i < marked_el.Size(); i++)
04370          {
04371             Bisection(marked_el[i], v_to_v, NULL, NULL, middle);
04372 
04373             ii = NumOfElements - 1;
04374             Bisection(ii, v_to_v, NULL, NULL, middle);
04375             Bisection(NumOfElements - 1, v_to_v, NULL, NULL, middle);
04376             Bisection(ii, v_to_v, NULL, NULL, middle);
04377 
04378             Bisection(marked_el[i], v_to_v, NULL, NULL, middle);
04379             Bisection(NumOfElements-1, v_to_v, NULL, NULL, middle);
04380             Bisection(marked_el[i], v_to_v, NULL, NULL, middle);
04381          }
04382          break;
04383       }
04384 
04385       if (WantTwoLevelState)
04386       {
04387          RefinedElement::State = RefinedElement::FINE;
04388          State = Mesh::TWO_LEVEL_FINE;
04389       }
04390 
04391       // 4. Do the green refinement (to get conforming mesh).
04392       int need_refinement;
04393       // int need_refinement, onoe, max_gen = 0;
04394       do
04395       {
04396          // int redges[2], type, flag;
04397          need_refinement = 0;
04398          // onoe = NumOfElements;
04399          // for (i = 0; i < onoe; i++)
04400          for (i = 0; i < NumOfElements; i++)
04401          {
04402             // ((Tetrahedron *)elements[i])->ParseRefinementFlag(redges, type, flag);
04403             // if (flag > max_gen)  max_gen = flag;
04404             if (elements[i]->NeedRefinement(v_to_v, middle))
04405             {
04406                need_refinement = 1;
04407                Bisection(i, v_to_v, NULL, NULL, middle);
04408             }
04409          }
04410       }
04411       while (need_refinement == 1);
04412 
04413       // cout << "Maximum generation: " << max_gen << endl;
04414 
04415       // 5. Update the boundary elements.
04416       do
04417       {
04418          need_refinement = 0;
04419          for (i = 0; i < NumOfBdrElements; i++)
04420             if (boundary[i]->NeedRefinement(v_to_v, middle))
04421             {
04422                need_refinement = 1;
04423                Bisection(i, v_to_v, middle);
04424             }
04425       }
04426       while (need_refinement == 1);
04427 
04428       // 6. Un-mark the Pf elements.
04429       int refinement_edges[2], type, flag;
04430       for (i = 0; i < NumOfElements; i++)
04431       {
04432          Element *El = elements[i];
04433          while (El->GetType() == Element::BISECTED)
04434             El = ((BisectedElement *) El)->FirstChild;
04435          ((Tetrahedron *)El)->ParseRefinementFlag(refinement_edges, type,
04436                                                   flag);
04437          if (type == Tetrahedron::TYPE_PF)
04438             ((Tetrahedron *)El)->CreateRefinementFlag(refinement_edges,
04439                                                       Tetrahedron::TYPE_PU,
04440                                                       flag);
04441       }
04442 
04443       NumOfBdrElements = boundary.Size();
04444 
04445       // 7. Free the allocated memory.
04446       delete [] middle;
04447 
04448 #ifdef MFEM_DEBUG
04449       CheckElementOrientation();
04450 #endif
04451 
04452       if (el_to_edge != NULL)
04453       {
04454          if (WantTwoLevelState)
04455          {
04456             c_el_to_edge = el_to_edge;
04457             f_el_to_edge = new Table;
04458             c_bel_to_edge = bel_to_edge;
04459             bel_to_edge = NULL;
04460             NumOfEdges = GetElementToEdgeTable(*f_el_to_edge, be_to_edge);
04461             el_to_edge = f_el_to_edge;
04462             f_bel_to_edge = bel_to_edge;
04463          }
04464          else
04465             NumOfEdges = GetElementToEdgeTable(*el_to_edge, be_to_edge);
04466       }
04467       if (el_to_face != NULL)
04468       {
04469          if (WantTwoLevelState)
04470          {
04471             c_el_to_face = el_to_face;
04472             el_to_face = NULL;
04473             Swap(faces_info, fc_faces_info);
04474          }
04475          GetElementToFaceTable();
04476          GenerateFaces();
04477          if (WantTwoLevelState)
04478          {
04479             f_el_to_face = el_to_face;
04480          }
04481       }
04482 
04483       if (WantTwoLevelState)
04484       {
04485          f_NumOfVertices    = NumOfVertices;
04486          f_NumOfEdges       = NumOfEdges;
04487          f_NumOfFaces       = NumOfFaces;
04488          f_NumOfElements    = NumOfElements;
04489          f_NumOfBdrElements = NumOfBdrElements;
04490       }
04491 
04492    } //  end 'if (Dim == 3)'
04493 
04494    if (Nodes)  // curved mesh
04495    {
04496       UpdateNodes();
04497       UseTwoLevelState(wtls);
04498    }
04499 }
04500 
04501 void Mesh::UniformRefinement()
04502 {
04503    if (meshgen == 1)
04504    {
04505       Array<int> elem_to_refine(GetNE());
04506 
04507       for (int i = 0; i < elem_to_refine.Size(); i++)
04508          elem_to_refine[i] = i;
04509       LocalRefinement(elem_to_refine);
04510    }
04511    else if (Dim == 2)
04512       QuadUniformRefinement();
04513    else if (Dim == 3)
04514       HexUniformRefinement();
04515    else
04516       mfem_error("Mesh::UniformRefinement()");
04517 }
04518 
04519 void Mesh::Bisection(int i, const DSTable &v_to_v,
04520                      int *edge1, int *edge2, int *middle)
04521 {
04522    int *vert;
04523    int v[2][4], v_new, bisect, t;
04524    Element **pce;
04525    Vertex V;
04526 
04527    if (WantTwoLevelState)
04528    {
04529       pce = &(elements[i]);
04530       while (1)
04531       {
04532          t = pce[0]->GetType();
04533          if (t == Element::BISECTED)
04534             pce = & ( ((BisectedElement *) pce[0])->FirstChild );
04535          else if (t == Element::QUADRISECTED)
04536             pce = & ( ((QuadrisectedElement *) pce[0])->FirstChild );
04537          else
04538             break;
04539       }
04540    }
04541    else
04542       t = elements[i]->GetType();
04543 
04544 
04545    if (t == Element::TRIANGLE)
04546    {
04547       Triangle *tri;
04548 
04549       if (WantTwoLevelState)
04550          tri = (Triangle *) pce[0];
04551       else
04552          tri = (Triangle *) elements[i];
04553 
04554       vert = tri->GetVertices();
04555 
04556       // 1. Get the index for the new vertex in v_new.
04557       bisect = v_to_v(vert[0], vert[1]);
04558 #ifdef MFEM_DEBUG
04559       if (bisect < 0)
04560          mfem_error("Mesh::Bisection(...): ERROR");
04561 #endif
04562       if (middle[bisect] == -1)
04563       {
04564          v_new = NumOfVertices++;
04565          V(0) = 0.5 * (vertices[vert[0]](0) + vertices[vert[1]](0));
04566          V(1) = 0.5 * (vertices[vert[0]](1) + vertices[vert[1]](1));
04567          V(2) = 0.0;
04568          vertices.Append(V);
04569 
04570          // Put the element that may need refinement (because of this
04571          // bisection) in edge1, or -1 if no more refinement is needed.
04572          if (edge1[bisect] == i)
04573             edge1[bisect] = edge2[bisect];
04574 
04575          middle[bisect] = v_new;
04576       }
04577       else
04578       {
04579          v_new = middle[bisect];
04580 
04581          // This edge will require no more refinement.
04582          edge1[bisect] = -1;
04583       }
04584 
04585       // 2. Set the node indices for the new elements in v[0] and v[1] so that
04586       //    the  edge marked for refinement is between the first two nodes.
04587       v[0][0] = vert[2]; v[0][1] = vert[0]; v[0][2] = v_new;
04588       v[1][0] = vert[1]; v[1][1] = vert[2]; v[1][2] = v_new;
04589 
04590       if (WantTwoLevelState)
04591       {
04592 #ifdef MFEM_USE_MEMALLOC
04593          BisectedElement *aux = BEMemory.Alloc();
04594          aux->SetCoarseElem(tri);
04595 #else
04596          BisectedElement *aux = new BisectedElement(tri);
04597 #endif
04598          aux->FirstChild = tri = new Triangle(v[0], tri->GetAttribute());
04599          aux->SecondChild = NumOfElements;
04600          pce[0] = aux;
04601       }
04602       else
04603          tri->SetVertices(v[0]); // changes vert[0..2] !!!
04604       elements.Append(new Triangle(v[1], tri->GetAttribute()));
04605 
04606       // 3. edge1 and edge2 may have to be changed for the second triangle.
04607       if (v[1][0] < v_to_v.NumberOfRows() && v[1][1] < v_to_v.NumberOfRows())
04608       {
04609          bisect = v_to_v(v[1][0], v[1][1]);
04610 #ifdef MFEM_DEBUG
04611          if (bisect < 0)
04612             mfem_error("Mesh::Bisection(...): ERROR 2");
04613 #endif
04614          if (edge1[bisect] == i)
04615             edge1[bisect] = NumOfElements;
04616          else if (edge2[bisect] == i)
04617             edge2[bisect] = NumOfElements;
04618       }
04619       NumOfElements++;
04620    }
04621    else if (t == Element::TETRAHEDRON)
04622    {
04623       int j, type, new_type, old_redges[2], new_redges[2][2], flag;
04624       Tetrahedron *tet;
04625 
04626       if (WantTwoLevelState)
04627          tet = (Tetrahedron *) pce[0];
04628       else
04629          tet = (Tetrahedron *) elements[i];
04630 
04631       if (tet->GetRefinementFlag() == 0)
04632          mfem_error("Mesh::Bisection : TETRAHEDRON element is not marked for "
04633                     "refinement.");
04634 
04635       vert = tet->GetVertices();
04636 
04637       // 1. Get the index for the new vertex in v_new.
04638       bisect = v_to_v(vert[0], vert[1]);
04639       if (bisect == -1)
04640       {
04641          tet->ParseRefinementFlag(old_redges, type, flag);
04642          cerr << "Error in Bisection(...) of tetrahedron!" << endl
04643               << "   redge[0] = " << old_redges[0]
04644               << "   redge[1] = " << old_redges[1]
04645               << "   type = " << type
04646               << "   flag = " << flag << endl;
04647          mfem_error();
04648       }
04649 
04650       if (middle[bisect] == -1)
04651       {
04652          v_new = NumOfVertices++;
04653          for (j = 0; j < 3; j++)
04654             V(j) = 0.5 * (vertices[vert[0]](j) + vertices[vert[1]](j));
04655          vertices.Append(V);
04656 
04657          middle[bisect] = v_new;
04658       }
04659       else
04660          v_new = middle[bisect];
04661 
04662       // 2. Set the node indices for the new elements in v[2][4] so that
04663       //    the edge marked for refinement is between the first two nodes.
04664       tet->ParseRefinementFlag(old_redges, type, flag);
04665 
04666       v[0][3] = v_new;
04667       v[1][3] = v_new;
04668       new_redges[0][0] = 2;
04669       new_redges[0][1] = 1;
04670       new_redges[1][0] = 2;
04671       new_redges[1][1] = 1;
04672       switch (old_redges[0])
04673       {
04674       case 2:
04675          v[0][0] = vert[0]; v[0][1] = vert[2]; v[0][2] = vert[3];
04676          if (type == Tetrahedron::TYPE_PF) new_redges[0][1] = 4;
04677          break;
04678       case 3:
04679          v[0][0] = vert[3]; v[0][1] = vert[0]; v[0][2] = vert[2];
04680          break;
04681       case 5:
04682          v[0][0] = vert[2]; v[0][1] = vert[3]; v[0][2] = vert[0];
04683       }
04684       switch (old_redges[1])
04685       {
04686       case 1:
04687          v[1][0] = vert[2]; v[1][1] = vert[1]; v[1][2] = vert[3];
04688          if (type == Tetrahedron::TYPE_PF) new_redges[1][0] = 3;
04689          break;
04690       case 4:
04691          v[1][0] = vert[1]; v[1][1] = vert[3]; v[1][2] = vert[2];
04692          break;
04693       case 5:
04694          v[1][0] = vert[3]; v[1][1] = vert[2]; v[1][2] = vert[1];
04695       }
04696 
04697       int attr = tet->GetAttribute();
04698       if (WantTwoLevelState)
04699       {
04700 #ifdef MFEM_USE_MEMALLOC
04701          BisectedElement *aux = BEMemory.Alloc();
04702          aux->SetCoarseElem(tet);
04703          tet = TetMemory.Alloc();
04704          tet->SetVertices(v[0]);
04705          tet->SetAttribute(attr);
04706 #else
04707          BisectedElement *aux = new BisectedElement(tet);
04708          tet = new Tetrahedron(v[0], attr);
04709 #endif
04710          aux->FirstChild = tet;
04711          aux->SecondChild = NumOfElements;
04712          pce[0] = aux;
04713       }
04714       else
04715          tet->SetVertices(v[0]);
04716       //  'tet' now points to the first child
04717       {
04718 #ifdef MFEM_USE_MEMALLOC
04719          Tetrahedron *tet2 = TetMemory.Alloc();
04720          tet2->SetVertices(v[1]);
04721          tet2->SetAttribute(attr);
04722          elements.Append(tet2);
04723 #else
04724          elements.Append(new Tetrahedron(v[1], attr));
04725 #endif
04726       }
04727 
04728       // 3. Set the bisection flag
04729       switch (type)
04730       {
04731       case Tetrahedron::TYPE_PU:
04732          new_type = Tetrahedron::TYPE_PF; break;
04733       case Tetrahedron::TYPE_PF:
04734          new_type = Tetrahedron::TYPE_A;  break;
04735       default:
04736          new_type = Tetrahedron::TYPE_PU;
04737       }
04738 
04739       tet->CreateRefinementFlag(new_redges[0], new_type, flag+1);
04740       ((Tetrahedron *)elements[NumOfElements])->
04741          CreateRefinementFlag(new_redges[1], new_type, flag+1);
04742 
04743       NumOfElements++;
04744    }
04745    else
04746       mfem_error("Bisection for now works only for triangles & tetrahedra.");
04747 }
04748 
04749 void Mesh::Bisection(int i, const DSTable &v_to_v, int *middle)
04750 {
04751    int *vert;
04752    int v[2][3], v_new, bisect, t;
04753    Element **pce;
04754 
04755    if (WantTwoLevelState)
04756    {
04757       pce = &(boundary[i]);
04758       while (1)
04759       {
04760          t = pce[0]->GetType();
04761          if (t == Element::BISECTED)
04762             pce = & ( ((BisectedElement *) pce[0])->FirstChild );
04763          else if (t == Element::QUADRISECTED)
04764             pce = & ( ((QuadrisectedElement *) pce[0])->FirstChild );
04765          else
04766             break;
04767       }
04768    }
04769    else
04770       t = boundary[i]->GetType();
04771 
04772    if (t == Element::TRIANGLE)
04773    {
04774       Triangle *tri;
04775       if (WantTwoLevelState)
04776          tri = (Triangle *) pce[0];
04777       else
04778          tri = (Triangle *) boundary[i];
04779 
04780       vert = tri->GetVertices();
04781 
04782       // 1. Get the index for the new vertex in v_new.
04783       bisect = v_to_v(vert[0], vert[1]);
04784       if (middle[bisect] == -1)
04785          mfem_error("Error in Bisection(...) of boundary triangle!");
04786       else
04787          v_new = middle[bisect];
04788 
04789       // 2. Set the node indices for the new elements in v[0] and v[1] so that
04790       //    the  edge marked for refinement is between the first two nodes.
04791       v[0][0] = vert[2]; v[0][1] = vert[0]; v[0][2] = v_new;
04792       v[1][0] = vert[1]; v[1][1] = vert[2]; v[1][2] = v_new;
